SEARCH
Package com.pjv.Helpers

Class LoadGame

java.lang.Object
com.pjv.Helpers.LoadGame
public class LoadGame extends Object
The LoadGame class provides functionality to load a game from a file, read the game history, and restore the game state.

    • choseFile

      public File choseFile()
      Opens a file chooser dialog for the user to select a game file to load.
      Returns:
      the selected File, or null if no file was selected

      Returns:
